Body:
I'm trying to do something as simple as calling a REST API using an universal app for windows 10 IoT but I can't find a way to do it.

Normally I would use:

private XElement ImportData(string sourceUrl)	    {		        WebClient wc = new WebClient();		        String source = wc.DownloadString(sourceUrl);	        return XElement.Parse(source, LoadOptions.None);		    }

but it isn't available.

you should use HttpClient instead of WebClient. Try this

HttpClient client = new HttpClient();	string url = URL here";	HttpResponseMessage response = await client.GetAsync(url);	return response.Content.ReadAsString();
"
do you have an example for Put as the code I have does not work.  http://stackoverflow.com/questions/33464906/why-does-my-web-api-client-call-not-work-in-raspberry-pi2-iot
I have a post here that details calling a REST service with HttpClient:http://blogs.msdn.com/b/wsdevsol/archive/2013/02/05/how-to-use-httpclient-to-post-json-data.aspx
